name: Beaches of Taniti
address: Various locations around Yellow Leaf Bay
short_description: Relax on native white sandy beaches or enjoy water activities.
imagealt: brown beach umbrellas on beach during daytime

name: Taniti Rainforest
address: Various rainforest trails near Taniti City
short_description: Explore hiking trails and enjoy zip-lining adventures.
imagealt: a set of stairs leading up to a forest

name: Taniti Volcano
short_description: Visit the active volcano and observe its natural beauty.
imagealt: brown and green mountain surrounded by calm water at daytime

name: Taniti History Museum
short_description: Learn about the local history and culture of Taniti.
imagealt: The classic tourist building of Fort Pendem Van Den Bosch, Ngawi Regency, East Java

name: Chartered Fishing Tours
short_description: Go on guided fishing tours in Yellow Leaf Bay.

name: Snorkeling
short_description: Enjoy snorkeling in clear waters near the beaches.
imagealt: SCUBA divers investigate a coral reef

name: Zip-lining
short_description: Experience thrilling zip-line rides through the rainforest canopy.

name: Taniti Pubs & Microbrewery
short_description: Enjoy drinks at local pubs and a microbrewery.
imagealt: a bar with bottles of alcohol on the beach

name: Dance Club
short_description: Dance and enjoy nightlife at the new club.
imagealt: people standing on stage with blue lights

name: Movie Theater
short_description: Catch the latest films at a local cinema.
imagealt: People watching the new Game of thrones episode in cinema

name: Helicopter Rides
short_description: See the island from above with scenic helicopter tours.
imagealt: black helicopter flying over green grass field during daytime

name: Arcade
short_description: Play arcade games and enjoy family-friendly entertainment.
imagealt: a row of pinball machines sitting next to each other

name: Art Galleries
short_description: View and purchase artwork from local artists.

name: Bowling
short_description: Enjoy bowling with friends and family.
imagealt: a bowling alley filled with bowling balls and tvs

name: Nine-Hole Golf Course
short_description: Play golf at the soon-to-be-operational nine-hole course.
imagealt: Man hits golf ball with golf club

name: Boat Tours
short_description: Take guided boat tours around the island.
imagealt: a group of people riding on top of boats in the water

name: Bus Tours
short_description: See the island sights on a guided bus tour.
imagealt: a colorful bus parked on the side of the road
